title: Nectar Ninja
shortDescription: Send website announcements, polls, questionnaires and more!
longDescription:
# Send website notifications.
## Let users know of new features, deals or downtimes. Dead-simple. Yes, it's free.

Sign up with your Twitter account and write your message.
Send an alert or notification, ask users for a question or let them rate your service.
The message will be displayed on your website.
instructions: To send a message log in from https://nectar.ninja/
author: Nectar Ninja

categories.title: Add-ons
categories.description: Drop-in components to add to your website.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

categories.title: Marketing
categories.description: Promote content, collect email addresses, and increase engagement.

categories.title: Social Media
categories.description: Integrate your website with Twitter, Facebook, and other networks.

proposedApp.title: Nectar Ninja
proposedApp.shortDescription: Let users know of new features, deals or downtimes.
proposedApp.longDescription: # Dead simple. No sign-up required. Send a tweet or a direct message to **@NectarNinja** Add hashtag **#alert** or **#notification** to send a message. Add **#question** to ask for feedback. Optionally add an URL that will get displayed as a “Read More” button. # Tips & Tricks ## Hiding a message To hide an existing notification or alert send a tweet or direct message containing only the hashtag **#hide**. ## Adding a Read More button To add a Read More button add a URL to your tweet or direct message. ## Choosing a message color To change to color of the unread notification circle add either **#notification** for green or **#alert** for red. One of those hashtags is mandatory, tweets sent without a hashtag will not be processed. ## Asking for feedback To ask for feedback add **#question** to your messages (don't add **#alert** or **#notification**). The bot will send you a link from where you can read the replies. ## Voting To let users vote add **#rating** to your messages (don't add **#alert** or **#notification**). The bot will send you a link from where you can read the replies. ## Sending long messages Send direct messages instead of tweets to send longer messages.
proposedApp.instructions: Send a tweet or a direct message to **@NectarNinja** Add hashtag **#alert** or **#notification** to send a message. Add **#question** to ask for feedback. Optionally add an URL that will get displayed as a “Read More” button. ### Tips & Tricks #### Hiding a message To hide an existing notification or alert send a tweet or direct message containing only the hashtag **#hide**. #### Adding a Read More button To add a Read More button add a URL to your tweet or direct message. #### Choosing a message color To change to color of the unread notification circle add either **#notification** for green or **#alert** for red. One of those hashtags is mandatory, tweets sent without a hashtag will not be processed. #### Asking for feedback To ask for feedback add **#question** to your messages (don't add **#alert** or **#notification**). The bot will send you a link from where you can read the replies. #### Voting To let users vote add **#rating** to your messages (don't add **#alert** or **#notification**). The bot will send you a link from where you can read the replies. ## Sending long messages Send direct messages instead of tweets to send longer messages.
proposedApp.author: Serge
